Class GolfConfig.Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.samo_lego.golfiv.storage.GolfConfig.Main
  • Enclosing class:
    GolfConfig

    public static class GolfConfig.Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Main part of the config.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean antiTimer
      Tries to detect the timer check, which allows client to speed up the game, in order to move faster or use items faster.
      boolean checkForStrangeItems
      Checks item picked that come in players inventory, whether they have disallowed enchantments.
      boolean checkIllegalActions
      Checks whether is doing actions that cannot be done while having the GUI open.
      boolean checkKillaura
      Checks for killaura by summoning a fake player.
      boolean hitCheck
      Detects player hitting entity through full blocks or usage of reach hacks.
      boolean noFly
      Detects flight, either it being a boat-flight or normal player flight Status: working (might throw false positives when lagging, not sure)
      boolean noSpeed
      Tries to detect speed hacks.
      boolean preventCreativeStrangeItems
      Clears NBT items, but still allows block-picking.
      boolean preventElytraHacks
      Tries to prevent "fake" elytra movement.
      boolean yesFall
      Client can tell server its onGround status and server blindly accepts it.

    • Field Detail

      • checkForStrangeItems

        public boolean checkForStrangeItems
        Checks item picked that come in players inventory, whether they have disallowed enchantments. This can be disabled if you believe that players didn't spawn in illegals. Status: working

      • yesFall

        public boolean yesFall
        Client can tell server its onGround status and server blindly accepts it. This can allow client to not take any fall damage. This setting re-enables the check server-side and doesn't care about the client's onGround status. Status: working (might throw false positives when lagging, not sure)

      • noFly

        public boolean noFly
        Detects flight, either it being a boat-flight or normal player flight Status: working (might throw false positives when lagging, not sure)

      • antiTimer

        public boolean antiTimer
        Tries to detect the timer check, which allows client to speed up the game, in order to move faster or use items faster. Status: ohh, we are halfway there

      • noSpeed

        public boolean noSpeed
        Tries to detect speed hacks. Kinda works, but needs overhaul. Status: not really usable, as ice paths still throw false positives

      • preventElytraHacks

        public boolean preventElytraHacks
        Tries to prevent "fake" elytra movement. Bad. Status: even worse than speed checks, needs overhaul

      • preventCreativeStrangeItems

        public boolean preventCreativeStrangeItems
        Clears NBT items, but still allows block-picking. Status: working

      • checkIllegalActions

        public boolean checkIllegalActions
        Checks whether is doing actions that cannot be done while having the GUI open. (e. g. hitting, moving, etc.) Status: partially working

      • hitCheck

        public boolean hitCheck
        Detects player hitting entity through full blocks or usage of reach hacks. Status: working, waiting for falses to be reported.

      • checkKillaura

        public boolean checkKillaura
        Checks for killaura by summoning a fake player. Status: working, waiting for falses to be reported.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Main

        public Main()
